Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 119th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage near 119th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage near 119th/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
